name: Syymon Says
description:
Syymon Says is a simple "Simon Says" game where you fight creatures for points! 

Watch out! You only have 3 lives before your score is banked or forfeit.

--

Disclaimer:All assets used in the making of this game were either licensed for personal use or given away for free under a free commercial use license.

If any asset is wrongly used in game I sincerely apologize and will replace it once the copyright owner reaches to me in private.
